title: League keeps apparently lagging even though my ping and

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Every game when either im about to die or during laning phase or team fights this happens. For a good .5-1 s im unable to use abilities and the screen freezes. ive checked my ping and its fine, i have tried reinstalling league, doing the fix crap, reinstalling my graphics card software, getting a new graphics card. thoughts?

replies.body:
Do you notice any change in your FPS at all during these micro-freezes? Do you see any "attempting to reconnect" or any other network-related message?

Let me know a bit more detail and we can work together to resolve this.

https://www.twitch.tv/theincentive/v/92674181

at 4:45-4:55 is where the first one happens, it looks like there is fps drop. **please mute stream while watching because I can't remember the conversations that were had during this video.**

The thing that immediately jumps out at me based on the video is that your FPS is inconsistent because it isn't capped. Those few micro-stutters seem to be a direct result of FPS change due to actions in the lane. I recommend capping your FPS in-game to 60 if your display is at a 60Hz refresh rate, or 120 if your refresh rate is 120Hz. You can find this setting inside **VIDEO** under the in-game options.

Let me know if that caused any change.

I just tried calling my fps to 60 and I didn't see a change. I was talking to one of my friends about it and he was suggesting that my graphics card port might be the problem and to move the card to a different port. I'll try that once I get home and put another update under here

https://gyazo.com/d3fee2ab3da90b8e337564ceacbe6161

This is what i got when i checked the packets via the link in the comment below.

Hello, sounds like packet loss. Can you try these tutorials:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq6

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader

https://gyazo.com/d3fee2ab3da90b8e337564ceacbe6161

this is what it gave for abnormalities
